next_steps.note: "Brainstorm potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, love, loss, social commentary). Add 3-5 ideas to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Research different poetry forms (e.g., sonnet, haiku, free verse) and identify 2-3 forms to experiment with. Add to 'Ideas' list.",
"Write a first draft of at least one short poem (8-12 lines), focusing on initial imagery and feeling, and document it as a 'Progress' item (even if rough!).",
"Create an 'Issues' list item: 'Define overall project scope - number of poems, length, target audience'.",
"Identify 3-5 poets whose work resonates with the desired style/themes for inspiration; add to the 'Ideas' list as potential reference points."
